---
id: delete-mod-kvp-metadata
title: "Delete Mod KVP Metadata"
description: "Delete key value pairs metadata defined for this mod. Successful request will return `204 No Content`."

custom_edit_url: null
---

import MethodEndpoint from "@theme/ApiExplorer/MethodEndpoint";
import ParamsDetails from "@theme/ParamsDetails";
import ParamsItem from "@theme/ParamsItem";
import RequestSchema from "@theme/RequestSchema";
import StatusCodes from "@theme/StatusCodes";
import OperationTabs from "@theme/OperationTabs";
import TabItem from "@theme/TabItem";
import Heading from "@theme/Heading";

<Heading
  as={"h1"}
  className={"openapi__heading"}
  children={"Delete Mod KVP Metadata"}
>
</Heading>

<MethodEndpoint
  method={"delete"}
  path={"/games/{game-id}/mods/{mod-id}/metadatakvp"}
  context={"endpoint"}
>
  
</MethodEndpoint>



Delete key value pairs metadata defined for this mod. Successful request will return `204 No Content`.

<Heading
  id={"request"}
  as={"h2"}
  className={"openapi-tabs__heading"}
  children={"Request"}
>
</Heading>

<ParamsDetails
  parameters={[{"name":"game-id","in":"path","description":"Game id","required":true,"schema":{"type":"integer"},"example":1},{"name":"mod-id","in":"path","description":"Mod id","required":true,"schema":{"type":"integer"},"example":2}]}
>
  
</ParamsDetails>

<RequestSchema
  title={"Body"}
  body={{"content":{"application/x-www-form-urlencoded":{"schema":{"title":"Delete Mod Metadata Request","required":["metadata"],"properties":{"metadata":{"description":"Key value pairs you want to delete where the the key and value are separated by a colon ':'. Every pair to delete requires a separate field with metadata[] as the key (eg. metadata[]=pistol-dmg:800, metadata[]=gravity:9.8).<br /><br />__NOTE:__ If the string contains only the key and no colon ':', _all_ metadata with that key will be removed.","type":"array","items":{"type":"string"},"example":"pistol-dmg:88:400"}},"type":"object"}}}}}
>
  
</RequestSchema>

<StatusCodes
  id={undefined}
  label={undefined}
  responses={{"204":{"description":"Successful Request. No Body Returned.","content":{"application/json":{"schema":{"title":"204","type":"object","default":"204 No Content"}}}},"403":{"description":"The authenticated user does not have permission to delete metadata from this mod, this action is restricted to team managers & administrators only.","content":{"application/json":{"schema":{"title":"Error Object","properties":{"error":{"description":"Contains error data.","properties":{"code":{"description":"The [HTTP code](/restapi/docs/response-codes).","type":"integer","format":"int32","default":403},"error_ref":{"description":"The mod.io error code.","type":"integer","default":10000},"message":{"description":"The server response to your request. Responses will vary depending on the endpoint, but the object structure will persist.","type":"string","default":"You do not have the required permissions to access this resource."},"errors":{"description":"Optional Validation errors object. This field is only supplied if the response is a validation error `422 Unprocessible Entity`. See [errors documentation](/restapi/docs/errors) for more information.","type":"object"}},"type":"object"}},"type":"object"}}},"x-errorrefs":{"15013":"The authenticated user does not have permission to delete metadata from this mod, this action is restricted to team managers & administrators only."}}}}
>
  
</StatusCodes>
